definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]

sentences.english: One type of Acacia tree in South America encourages ants to live in it.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲有一種阿拉伯膠樹會讓螞蟻住在裏面。

sentences.english: And so what does the Acacia Tree Kingdom desire to close this essay with?
sentences.chinese: 那阿拉伯膠樹王國想要以什麼來結束此文章呢？

sentences.english: We used Arabic gum as Wall material to imbed SOD.
sentences.chinese: 我們用阿拉伯膠作壁材，包埋SOD。

sentences.english: An experiment on modification of trypsin with Arabic gum is reported.
sentences.chinese: 用阿拉伯膠修飾胰蛋白酶。
